org.apache.hadoop.metrics2

Class MetricsJsonBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.MetricsRecordBuilder
      • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.MetricsJsonBuilder

  • @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class MetricsJsonBuilder
extends MetricsRecordBuilder
    Build a JSON dump of the metrics. The toString() operator dumps out all values collected.
